articles.title: Canada keeps airspace open to Russian airliners for now - Canada News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Russian airliners continue to fly through Canadian skies after several European countries shut their airspace to Russian carriers in response to Moscow's invasion of Ukraine – but Ottawa is keeping all options on the table.

articles.title: Steinhoff boosts revenue by 10% as it looks to put lawsuits behind it - News24
articles.description: Steinhoff says it boosted group revenue by 10% in the last quarter of 2021 despite the reintroduction of Covid-19 restrictions in Eastern Europe.
articles.content:
• Retailer Steinhoff says its revenues grew by 10% in the last quarter of 2021.
